testimonies.name: Sujin Kim
testimonies.blurb: Vacationer helped me to plan my dream getaway! I didn't think I could afford to travel and see the things that I really wanted to see, but Vacationer helped me to plan out the cost and even gave me some travel safety tips!

testimonies.name: Lamar Lewis
testimonies.blurb: At first, I was skeptical of Vacationer, but when I put together my first trip and calculated the costs I couldn't believe that my dream of travelling the world was so affordable!
